item.description:
I just registered for this race. I've never run this race before, but I think it will be a good race for anyone training for a fall marathon, and a nice challenge for those who typically draw the line at half marathons (30K = 18.6 miles). The website for the race is:

Nahant 30 K Road Race
www.northshorestriders.com/Nahant30K/

For slower runners (11-minute milers and over), they are offering an early start time of 7:30. Everyone else starts at 8:30.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Organized Race- Nahant 30K Road Race on September 27th
